about:

In 2019 I steered the New Museum and Apple partnership to bring augmented reality art walks to the public featuring commissions by artists Nick Cave, Cao Fei, John Giorno, and Pippilotti Rist.

I love the Internet. But even more I like making people happy with it. I want what your users want. As such, I do work in a lot of realms--taxonomy, ontology, data modeling, knowledge graphs, search, user experience & testing, viral social media, content creation, branding & lecturing on these subjects.

Building a remote department with a national reputation was a fun part of my last position. I love building remote teams, not just remote workers who work alone or are considered secondary workers. I especially love remote mentoring and career building, and hiring.

The ampersand and tilde are my favorite characters.
